item.description:
Time Crimes - Has unfortunately passed Boston. I have replaced it with Extraordinary Measures:
Working class father John Crowley (Brendan Fraser) is finally on the fast track to corporate success when his two young children Megan and Patrick are diagnosed with Pompe Disease - a disease that prevents the body from breaking down sugar. In time, it disables the heart and the muscles, ultimately resulting in death. With the support of his wife Aileen (Keri Russell), John ditches his career and teams with unconventional specialist Dr. Robert Stonehill (Harrison Ford), to found a bio-tech company and develop a cure in time to save Megan and Patrick's lives. As Dr. Stonehill works tirelessly to prove the theories that made him the black sheep of the medical community, a powerful bond is forged between the two unlikely allies. But their greatest struggle is yet to come. - Jason Buchanan, All Movie Guide

item.name: Extraordinary Measures
